vdContracts.name: UBS Private Banking Agreement
vdContracts.terminationNotes: 90 days written notice required. Early termination fee of 1 quarter management fee.
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Full-service private banking including custody, advisory, and reporting services.

vdContracts.name: KPMG Annual Audit Engagement
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Annual audit of family office consolidated financial statements and trust entities.

vdContracts.name: Baker McKenzie Legal Retainer
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: General corporate counsel, M&A advisory, and estate planning support.

vdContracts.name: PwC Tax Advisory Services
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: International tax planning, compliance, and transfer pricing advisory.

vdContracts.name: Northern Trust Custody Agreement
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Global custody, fund administration, and securities lending.

vdContracts.name: Accenture System Integration
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Integration of portfolio management and reporting systems.

vdContracts.name: AWS Enterprise Agreement
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Cloud infrastructure, data storage, and security services.

vdContracts.name: Bloomberg Terminal License
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Bloomberg Terminal access for 5 users with full data package.

vdContracts.name: AXA Insurance Policy
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Directors & Officers liability and professional indemnity coverage.

vdContracts.name: McKinsey Governance Advisory
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Family governance framework development and implementation.

vdContracts.name: Credit Suisse FX Services
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Foreign exchange execution and hedging services.

vdContracts.name: Morgan Stanley Brokerage
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Equity and fixed income brokerage services.

vdContracts.name: Cybersecurity Assessment
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Quarterly penetration testing and annual security assessment.

vdContracts.name: PWS Software License
vdContracts.scopeOfServices: Portfolio accounting and performance reporting software.

vdScorecards.notes: Excellent overall performance. Continue current engagement.
Performance issues need to be addressed.

recommendationsJson: Consider as reference for other custodians
Consider multi-year engagement for better rates

vdIncidents.title: Project milestone delay - Phase 2
vdIncidents.description: Phase 2 delivery delayed by 3 weeks due to resource constraints on vendor side.
vdIncidents.rootCause: Vendor resource reallocation to higher priority client

vdIncidents.title: Reporting module performance issues
vdIncidents.description: Report generation taking 3x longer than normal during month-end processing.

vdIncidents.title: Trade confirmation delay
vdIncidents.description: Trade confirmations delayed by 4 hours on October 25th.
vdIncidents.rootCause: Email gateway issue on vendor side

vdIncidents.title: Cloud service outage
vdIncidents.description: Brief service interruption affecting data access for 15 minutes.

vdIncidents.title: Statement format change notification
vdIncidents.description: Format change in quarterly statements caused minor reconciliation issues.
vdIncidents.rootCause: Vendor system upgrade with format changes
vdIncidents.resolution: Received updated specifications, adjusted import mapping
